title: DETOX BALANCE 330ml
description: This powerful synergy of Black Pepper, lemon, sweet almond oil and jojoba oil is the perfect body detox. This lightweight body oil contains nourishing actives to help smooth and soften skin while the uplifting fragrance of lemon leaves the body and mind feeling refreshed. Ideal as part of an anti-cellulite or body cleaning program. Improves skin elasticity During night skin forms new cells Firms sagging & loose skin
